content.full_text: Receipt of Denton Offutt to William Barnett, 26 March 18321 Received ofWmBarnettin full of all due debts and demands up to this date
paragraphs: Receipt of Denton Offutt to William Barnett, 26 March 18321 Received ofWmBarnettin full of all due debts and demands up to this date

footnotes.text: 1Abraham Lincoln wrote the entirety of this document.
2Lincolnwrote this note in his capacity as a clerk in Denton Offutt’s store inNew Salem, Illinois. The payment probably settled William Barnett’s accounts at the store.

structured_content.text: Receipt of Denton Offutt to William Barnett, 26 March 18321
Received ofWmBarnettin full of all due debts and demands up to this date
